movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines, and joins a rebellion to break free.

genres.name: Action
genres.description: High-energy films with intense sequences and continuous motion

genres.name: Drama
genres.description: Character-driven narratives focusing on emotional themes

genres.name: Science Fiction
genres.description: Stories exploring advanced technology and scientific concepts

genres.name: Comedy
genres.description: Light-hearted films designed to make audiences laugh
